Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: blitzkrieg \blitz"krieg\ (bl[i^]tz"kr[=e]g), n. [German, blitz lightning + krieg war.] an overwhelming all-out attack with infantry, armor, and air forces, especially by surprise against an unprepared enemy. [PJC]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
blitzkrieg \blitz"krieg\ v. to fight a quick and surprising war.
Syn: fight a blitzkrieg. [WordNet 1.5]
blitzkrieg v : fight a quick and surprising war
